r.d: Componere is able to compose classes at runtime, and monkey patch objects.
r.n: - Fix #25 Segfault with OpCache and abstract classes - Fix #26 Error: Class 0x01 not found" if Definition( 'MyDerived', 'MyClass' ) - Fix #29 Protected and Private properties not working as expected - Fix #30 Can NOT addProperty in extending class - Compatibility with PHP 8
